page.title: 14BALLOCH SCHOOL
page.content: Balloch school has been running for about 115 years and it has 185 children who are taught in 12 huts.In each hut there are 20 to 31 pupils.The school has gym equipment even though they have to use the community hall for gym.The school has a tuck-shop and it has school dinners made by three different cooks.One full time and two part time.It has 8 teachers,an art teacher,a sewing teacher and a gaelic teacher.In the field they have football,hockey, cricket,athletics,galas and barbecues. In one room they have music where the recorders,choir and music making group practice.The hall they use is about 3 times bigger than an average classroom.
